content:
Acronyms
MDI - Medicolegal Death Investigation
 IG - Implementation Guide 
VRDR - Vital Records and Death Reporting 
CMS - Case Management System (Coroner/Medical Examiner systems) 
FHIR - Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources 
EDRS - Electronic Death Registration System
API - Application Programmable Interfaces

Quick Links: Tools
MDI Connectathon Page: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=130484156
MDI FHIR Implementation Guide: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-mdi-ig/toc.html
Raven (CMS Testing Tool): https://apps.hdap.gatech.edu/raven-dashboard/cases
BlueJay (EDRS Testing Tool): https://apps.hdap.gatech.edu/bluejay-fhir-server/
MDI Java Library: https://github.com/MortalityReporting/MDI_javalib 

Connectathon Page will include MDI Standard API Spec, MDI Standard API Test Plan and link to Test Cases
Toxicology API spec is available at the FHIR site: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/messageheader-operation-process-message.html

Validation Steps: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Validator+-+MDI
MDI Standard API Test Plan: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=130484156&preview=/130484156/81026837/MDI%20Standard%20API%20Test%20Plan%20-%201.10.22-final.docx
MDI Standard API Spec: https://gtvault-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/mc142_gatech_edu/Ea15yeUc1ddGj7_Fi0qYo9oBsuMHAA3d1doft4oBg1EZQg?rtime=3g23CRXV2Ug
Toxicology API Spec: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/messageheader-operation-process-message.html
